description.description: Free text description of the deployment.

url.description: Base URL of the API server.

component.description: The name of the component being deployed. Ex: billing

hosts.description: Name of affected host name. Can be a list.

owner.description: The person responsible for the deployment.

validate_certs.description: If C(no), SSL certificates for the target url will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.
